ol.li: SHALL conform to Level One Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10)
SHALL conform to Level One Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10)
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId, where its data type is InfrastructureRootTypeId
Contains exactly one [1..1] id, where its data type is II
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CE
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is TS
Contains exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where its data type is CE
Contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20"/> <id root="f04ce9b2-2f6e-4025-8434-cfc7ea352350"/> <title/> <effectiveTime/> </ClinicalDocument>
